Name: Numéro d'identité fiscale (NIF)
Description: The Haiti Tax Identification Number (NIF) is issued by the Direction Générale des Impôts (DGI) since 1987.  Any Haitian natural or legal person gets this 10-digit number.

Name: Carte d'identification nationale
Description: The Haiti national identification card is meant to replace the fiscal identity card.  Created 2005.

Name: Biometrics Reference Code
Description: Code referencing a patient's record in an external biometrics system

Name: ZL EMR ID
Description: A unique identifier issued to all patients by the ZL EMR.  Blocks of this identifier are issued to each site to prevent duplication, so the identifier is unique across all sites.  The identifier uses six digits and is alphanumeric base 30, omitting the letters B, I, O, Q, S and Z as these can be confused with 8, 1, 0, 0, 5 and 2

Name: HIVEMR-V1
Description: Internal EMR ID for this Patient in the Haiti EMR V1 system

Name: User-Entered Reference Number
Description: Any user-entered reference number not assigned by the system; for instance, allows the user to store a dossier number not assigned by the current system

Name: HIV EMR V1 Infant ID
Description: Internal INFANT_ID for this patient in the Haiti EMR V1 system

Name: HIV EMR V1 Infant Code
Description: Code referencing the HIV EMR INFANT_CODE field in the Haiti EMR V1 system
